mapper.select: select id, username, realname, usertype, reg_time regtime, lastlogin_time lastLoginTime, ip, status from sys_user limit #{startrecord} , #{recordsize}
select u.id, u.username, u.realname, u.usertype, u.status from sys_user u where u.status=1 and u.id=#{userid}
select u.id, u.password, u.username, u.usertype, u.random, u.status from sys_user u where u.status=1 and u.username=#{username}
select count(*) from sys_user u where u.username=#{username}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user( username, realname, password, usertype, reg_time, ip, random, lastlogin_time ) values( #{username}, #{realname}, #{password}, #{usertype}, now(), #{ip}, #{random}, now() )
